definitions.definition: the part of the day from the time when the sun rises or you wake up until the middle of the day or lunch time:
during the early part of the day:
examples: I listen to the radio in the morning.

definitions.definition: at some time between twelve o'clock at night and twelve o'clock in the middle of the day:
examples: The murder took place at four in the morning.
She said she would see you in the morning.

definitions.definition: a friendly way of greeting people when you meet them in the morning:
examples: Morning, Sue! How are you today?
